subject: Create Supabase voice tables
description: Run SQL in Supabase Dashboard to create voice_sessions and voice_transcripts tables. SQL is in the conversation. Tables: voice_sessions (id, started_at, ended_at, transcript_count, mode, metadata) and voice_transcripts (id, session_id, role, text, timestamp, complexity_score, complexity_tier, provider, latency_ms, metadata). Also create increment_transcript_count function.
